    • RulesAffector

      public RulesAffector(RuleSet ruleSet, boolean excludeTowers, int addedInfluencePoints, int motherNatureAdditionalMovements, boolean affectProfessorAssignment)
      Default constructor
      Parameters:
      ruleSet - rules of the game
      excludeTowers - if true, the towers are excluded from influence count
      addedInfluencePoints - added influence points
      motherNatureAdditionalMovements - mother nature additional movements
      affectProfessorAssignment - if true, assignation of professor is affected
